meanings.definition: Excessively fond of or submissive to one's wife.
meanings.sent1: He displayed uxoriousness by always putting his wife's needs before his own.
meanings.sent2: The uxoriousness man surprised his wife with flowers every day.
meanings.sent3: His uxoriousness was evident when he happily did all the household chores without complaint.
meanings.sent4: Her uxoriousness shone through when he referred to his wife as his queen.
meanings.sent5: The level of his uxoriousness was unmatched as he showered his wife with love and attention.

meanings.definition: Showing excessive fondness or submission to one's wife.
meanings.sent1: The uxoriousness husband never missed a chance to praise his wife's cooking.
meanings.sent2: She found his uxoriousness endearing and appreciated his constant affection.
meanings.sent3: His friends teased him about his uxoriousness, but he didn't mind at all.
meanings.sent4: The uxoriousness man's devotion to his wife was like a beacon of love in their home.
meanings.sent5: Her uxoriousness was evident in the way he always held his wife's hand wherever they went.
